channel.title: Ok got bored fort i'll try richscape out but i have a problem read for more info
channel.description:
Ok i got bored with making my server fort i'll leave it for today and have some fun so i download richscape and its all fine part from some of the commanms bit stupid how thay work lol
any way every time you do ::pnpc you trun into hans every time!
so i fort i'll make a way round it make a ring trun you into a pnpc but it dint work well it did it just truns you into hans!!!
how come why is it always doing this any ideas thanks

Thanks for your help very thankfull but its the same as it was but i did it any way still the same =(

any other ideas

item.title: Ok got bored fort i'll try richscape out but i have a problem read for more info
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

search for pnpc in client.java and place this in there in its place…

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }
    }

Read full topic
